changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${table.prefix}appsumo_event_log` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL, `action` varchar(30) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Key to identify action:activate,enhance_tier,reduce_tier,refund,update', `plan_id` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Partnerâ€™s Plan unique id', `uuid` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT 'License product key', `activation_email` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'email', `invoice_item_uuid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'Unique id of the activated invoice item', `handle_status` tinyint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0: handling, 1: handed with success, 2: hand with error, 3: dont need handle', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'created at', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'updated at', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `idx_activation_email` (`activation_email`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='Appsumo - event log';
